mapper.insert: insert into roomBoard (roomNum, boardNum, userId, boardName, boardTitle, boardContent, selectDay, adst, mode1, created) values (#{roomNum}, #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{boardName}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{selectDay}, #{adst}, #{mode1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select roomNum, boardNum, userId, boardName, boardTitle, boardContent, selectDay, adst, selectDay, to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, mode from roomBoard where roomNum = #{roomNum} order by created desc

select roomNum, boardNum, userId, boardName, boardTitle, boardContent, selectDay, adst, selectDay, to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, mode from roomBoard where roomNum = #{roomNum} and mode = #{mode} order by created desc
select subject, keyword, manager, title, introduce, backgroundImage, totalP, currentP, created from wholeRoom where roomNum = #{roomNum}
select * from test where name like '%' || #{item} || '%'
